title: The NABC's of basketball
brief_description: Five of America’s most respected and talented coaches analyse every aspect of the game of basketball. Lucius Mitchell examines the development of the big man; Bill Foster, the running game; Gene Barton relates the drills that his players use to develop individual offensive skills; Norm Stewart analyses the jump shot and one-hand free throw; Bobby Knight looks at team defence.
